description: '''K1 De Ultimate''' (born '''Wasiu Omogbolahan Olasunkanmi Adewale Ayinde Marshal''', 3 March 1957), is a Nigerian [[Fuji music|Fuji]] musician. He popularized  a brand of the fuji genre based on the work of the fuji creator [[Ayinde Barrister]] known as Talazo fuji that appeals to all age groups, irrespective of tribe and background.
